text: FYI to anyone looking at this. The docs are not clear on it but the solution with this is that when you want to get the font awesome to display as unicode instead of svg, you need to remove the `icon_set` property from the embed. For some reason that breaks the icon and it won't render. i.e.
How exactly do you mean to use it as a filter? As in to filter certain fields from showing up? or are you meaning more content on the page related?
